info.description: The TIDAL API is a [JSON:API](https://jsonapi.org/)–compliant web API that exposes TIDAL’s music, metadata, and user-related functionality through a consistent, resource-oriented design. More information and API management are available at [developer.tidal.com](developer.tidal.com)
info.title: TIDAL API

tags.description:
A track source file is the media source file of a track, meaning audio content.
After a track source file is uploaded successfully it will be ingested and transcoded into deliverables and
stored like any other content we receive from labels.
tags.name: trackSourceFiles

tags.description:
Status of metadata detection job for a track.
Tracks the progress of async jobs that detect and pre-fill metadata fields.
tags.name: tracksMetadataStatus

get.description: Retrieves multiple albums by available filters, or without if applicable.

parameters.description: Server-generated cursor value pointing a certain page of items. Optional, targets first page if not specified
parameters.name: page[cursor]

parameters.description: Allows the client to customize which related resources should be returned. Available options: artists, coverArt, genres, items, owners, providers, replacement, similarAlbums, suggestedCoverArts
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Share code that grants access to UNLISTED resources. When provided, allows non-owners to access resources that would otherwise be restricted.
parameters.name: shareCode

post.description:
Create a track source file. <p/>
The response contains a upload link that must be used to upload the actual content.<p/>
The headers in the upload link response must be sent doing the actual upload.

Default400Response.description: The request is malformed or invalid

Default404Response.description: The requested resource was not found

Default405Response.description: The HTTP method is not allowed for the requested resource

Default406Response.description: A response that satisfies the content negotiation headers cannot be produced

Default415Response.description: Unsupported request payload media type or content encoding

Default503Response.description: Temporarily unavailable; please try again later

TrackFilesReadById403Response.description: Cannot fulfill this request because required prerequisites are missing; The requested content is not available in your location; The requested content must be purchased to be accessed; Client is not allowed to access this content; This account is playing on another app or device

TrackFilesReadById404Response.description: The requested content does not exist or is no longer available

TrackManifestsReadById403Response.description: Cannot fulfill this request because required prerequisites are missing; The requested content is not available in your location; The requested content must be purchased to be accessed; Client is not allowed to access this content; This account is playing on another app or device

TrackManifestsReadById404Response.description: The requested content does not exist or is no longer available

externalLinks.description: Album links external to TIDAL API

backgroundColor.description: Background color for the suggested artwork

foregroundColor.description: Foreground color for the suggested artwork

createdAt.description: Time when the appreciation was created

editable.description: Boolean to indicate if the biography is editable (source = tidal or artist)

text.example: Once upon a time an artist is born

artistId.description: The artist id which is being claimed

externalLinks.description: Artist claim links external to TIDAL API

retrievedUpcs.description: List of UPCs retrieved from the DSP

contributionsEnabled.description: Is the artist enabled for contributions?

contributionsSalesPitch.example: Help me be a full time artist

externalLinks.description: Artist links external to TIDAL API

followsMyArtist.description: Boolean to indicate if the artist is following my artist

myArtistFollows.description: Boolean to indicate if my artist is following the artist

numberOfTracks.description: Total number of tracks released together with the provider

md5Hash.description: MD5 hash of file to be uploaded

size.description: File size of the artwork in bytes

blurHash.description: BlurHash representation of the artwork for placeholder display

selectedPaletteColor.description: Selected color from the extracted artwork palette

DrmData.description: DRM data. Absence implies no DRM.

pageType.description: Type of the page eg. home, artist

reportingId.description: Id used for reporting user events

detail.description: human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

id.description: unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

status.description: HTTP status code applicable to this problem

header.description: string indicating the name of a single request header which caused the error

parameter.description: string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error.

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the value in the request document that caused the error

href.description: Href to upload actual file to

additionalProperties.description: HTTP headers that must be added to the operation

headers.description: HTTP headers that must be added to the operation

nextCursor.description: Only cursor part of next link

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the claim was created

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp when the claim was last modified

bounded.description: Indicates if the playlist has a duration and set number of tracks

lastModifiedAt.description: Datetime of last modification of the playlist (ISO 8601)

numberOfFollowers.description: The amount of followers of the playlist

numberOfItems.description: Number of items in the playlist

reactionType.description: The type of reaction representing an emoji

refreshUrl.description: REDIRECT only: URL to redirect to if seller drops from onboarding

returnUrl.description: REDIRECT only: URL to redirect to after completed onboarding

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the connection was created

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp when the connection was last modified

status.description: Current status of this Stripe connection

scopes.collection.read: Read access to a user's "My Collection".
scopes.collection.write: Write access to a user's "My Collection".
scopes.entitlements.read: Read access to what functionality a user is entitled to access on TIDAL, such as whether they can stream music, use DJ add-ons and similar.
scopes.playback: Required to play media content and control playback.
scopes.playlists.read: Required to list playlists created by a user.
scopes.playlists.write: Write access to a user's playlists.
scopes.recommendations.read: Read access to a user’s personal recommendations.
scopes.search.read: Required to read personalized search results.
scopes.search.write: Required to update personalized search results, e.g. delete search history.
scopes.user.read: Read access to a user's account information, such as country and email address.
